import {React} from 'react' import {useSelector} from "react-redux" import {Container, Row, Col, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom" import SingleItem from '../components/SingleItem' import {FaArrowRight} from "react-icons/fa" import Main from '../components/Main' function HomePage({setsingleitem}) { const nav = useNavigate() const discounts = useSelector(state => state.items.value.biggestDiscounts) const openAll = () => { nav("/shop") } const openItem = (id, item) => { nav("/product/" + id) setsingleitem(item) } return (

Check out our hottest deals!

{discounts && discounts.map((x, i ) => openItem(x.id, x)}/>)}

SEE ALL

 ) } export default HomePage
